title: Linux cu Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the Linux cu command, a powerful tool for establishing remote connections and transferring files between systems. Learn practical examples and techniques to enhance your networking and communication skills.

meta.title: Linux cu Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Explore the Linux cu command, a powerful tool for establishing remote connections and transferring files between systems. Learn practical examples and techniques to enhance your networking and communication skills.
meta.keywords: Linux, cu command, remote connection, file transfer, networking, communication
